Transmitting of the HIGHEST DMR Repeater in New Mexico on La Mosca Peak, 11,200 Feet above sea level 15 miles northeast of downtown Grants, New Mexico. 50 Watt Hytera Dual-Mix Repeater. DB Products 633 omni pattern antenna. Antenna height is 180 feet above ground level. Powered with a back up Generator. On the air June 26, 2019. (Lat 35.252926 Long -107.596664)
IPSC Network: BrandMeister c Record retrieved from radioid.net
Features: BrandMeister on DMR Dual Mix Analog on PL Tone 131.8
Links: Full-time to the Mac Pass Repeater Group System .
Commands: Time Slot 1 3135 New Mexico Statewide, Time Slot 2 31301 MPRG1
